content.description:
Athenis civium tanto honore celebrabar, ut iam 
gravarergravo, -are: to overwhelm negotiis.
content.question: In the sentence, ut iam gravarer negotiis is translated

choices.label: since then work was overwhelming me
that I was overwhelmed by work then
so that I didn’t overwhelm my work then

content.answer: that I was overwhelmed by work then

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
